title: 1.7.10光晕mod恐怖的事。求解答......
author: Impala
txt_content:
刚好可怕，里面说：（...Ahhh, we're hit,we're hit! BAIT OTTTT...*Static*...）（Mayday! Mayday! Rear engines failing,....PULL UP! PULL UP!......)( We're hit! Mayday! Rear engines failing, we're going doun!....)还有2句的......
        生成建筑;关 地图;默认
地址：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-443520-1-1.html
原帖地址:http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding/minecraft-mods/1278200-halocraft-v0-7-1-the-longest-update-to-ever
